data.text:
When you're planning a trip, you never think about the unforeseeable events that might happen. 🌍
The answer? Opt for Europ Assistance, then there's no need to worry about the unexpected!

👉 Find out more: https://t.co/d9fBLfGCKa https://t.co/iI1Z021um8

Ready for pushback!

🛫 During this procedure, the aircraft is pushed backwards away from the airport gate, moving it from the parking position to the position from which taxiing can begin.

📷 @stephanskleinewelt https://t.co/qmkhk4MSvL

urls.title: A DIFFERENT BOLOGNA FOR EVERY AGE | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: In no way do we mean to imply that there are right or wrong activities based on your age. Bologna never ceases to amaze.

data.text:
Is Bologna young and alternative, appetizing and innovative, or relaxing and cultured?
There’s no right answer because Bologna is ALL of that.

data.text:
Your taste buds will never be more excited than when tucking into a plate of deliciously steaming orecchiette in Brindisi.
Is your mouth watering too? 🍝 
#WorldPastaDay #Pasta
✈ Fly to Apulia 👉 https://t.co/jzILeLsoeX

📷 @stefn79_ph https://t.co/FQQt9PixqY

@GregorKasieczka @ReclamVerlag Dear Gregor,
Following the regulations, the top pocket of our seats can only hold paper material.
We select the topics for magazine on the basis of international and appropriate content for the duration of the flight.
We hope you found something interesting anyway.😊

@flight_report Thank you so much for your feedback!! :) we are glad you enjoyed your flight with us!! We look forward to welcoming you back on board!!
Social Media Team

@8EL1N Ciao MAGOR,

ci dispiace che questi nostri cambiamenti non siano stati da te apprezzati.

Il nostro obiettivo è sempre quello di migliorarci.
Ti ringraziamo pertanto per il feedback, il quale provvederemo ad inoltrare agli uffici competenti.

Sperando di accoglierti
@KJSEvents1 We are really sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Please write us a DM with your file reference number, thank you for your cooperation.
@kali0tis Hi, we assure our colleagues are working on your refund. Kindly send a reminder by using the appropriate "Reminder" form available here, thank you: https://t.co/54prB1YMLr

@fbbonnie Dear Francesca,
we apologize for the inconvenience.

We kindly ask you to send us in DM the reference number of your request (T........S) so that we can double check it.

Social Media Team
Steph

☁️ Eyes on the skies, professional equipment 📸 and plenty of patience - all the ingredients for the perfect shot!
Thanks for this photo @andre_spotter_mxp, we absolutely love it 💙
#AdAstra https://t.co/iUBve62m7l

data.text: @RGTyler Dear Robert, safety of our passengers is our priority. When a flight cannot land at the scheduled airport, it's re-routed to the nearest airport but we ensure that all our passengers still reach their destination by bus, as in your case. We are sorry for the delay caused.

data.text:
Take in Trani’s marina and historic centre, then strike inland to feast on heavenly burrata in Andria. Continue southwards to UNESCO-listed Castel del Monte, Puglia’s most celebrated and mysterious castle 👉 https://t.co/gAr94kKBjn
#WeAreInPuglia
📸 Andrea Ruggeri @WeAreInPuglia https://t.co/A0cJjfRiZC
@ri_bi_d We suggest you to contact our Customer Care for receive immediate assistance.

@ri_bi_d Dear Richard, we apologize for any incovenience caused. 
Please reach the dedicated counter for assistance at the airport, or contact our Customer Care at +39 0452886140.

Thank you.

Liz,
SocialMediaTeam

@malcolmjolley we love it as well 😍

data.text:

data.text:
@NegrinSandro secured with seat belts.
We have already communicated to the airport involved to make more checks before boarding in order to avoid such situations. Thank you.

@NegrinSandro Hi Sandro, at the discretion of the on-board staff, in exceptional cases, it may happen that some passengers arrive on board with oversized cabin bags. To avoid unpleasant delays on your flight (only if there are unoccupied seats) in this case they were accepted anyway and

@handmadebyeliz Dear Eliz, we are very happy to have been helpful in getting your bags together!
Thank you for the nice words, we always try to assist our passengers as best we can. 💙
@RogiestPhilippe Thank you @RogiestPhilippe! You're making us blush 💙

@marcel_lucht Hey Marcel, looks like @RogiestPhilippe beat us to it 😎 we look forward to welcoming you on board. Especially in C-class, where you'll be so cuddled that you'll forget to turn on your laptop 😉

urls.title: Who invented the airplane tray table? | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: The tray table is one of your best allies on board. But who invented it? On AirDolomitiBlog

data.text:
#AirDolomitiBlog
Whether you put it down to eat a snack, finish a presentation on your laptop or play Sudoku, the tray table is one of your best allies on board 💺
But who invented it? 💡👉 https://t.co/HnZbxPbbRP https://t.co/22oyvsZV85

@AnyaWallach Dear Anya, you can find the form here. It seems to work, but if you need any help, don't hesitate to send us a DM and we will would be glad to help you.

https://t.co/ULQQS2p6iD

This weekend, we wanted to make Piazza Bra (Verona) sparkle even more resplendently 💚
We joined forces with @plasticfreeit to spruce up the city 🚮
It was a new opportunity for us to create a team spirit while doing something positive for the environment that surrounds us 🌍 https://t.co/iTXQQtCFdD

@NRPicerno Hi Nicolas,
We are very sorry that your experience with us was not positive. 
Passenger assistance is our priority, can we help you in any way?
Thank you.
@psaviousa Great choice the window seat! ✈💙

At the Festivaletteratura in Mantua we had the pleasure of sponsoring the 'Reinventing the city' project.
The protagonists were children 🤸 who, through play, experimented with a sense of community and green space living by building a big playground using recycled materials. https://t.co/STZ3Nn41Np

data.text: @Normanito1 @illycaffe There is a coffee machine for illycaffè capsules ☕️

@JamesBachmeier3 Hello James, we apologize for the delay of our today's flight EN8193. Please fill in the "Flight irregularity" form, available at this link: https://t.co/54prB2goa1
Thank you.
@ulkerciner We deeply apologize for the inconvenience. We have just sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center, they will check your file and give you feedback as soon as possible. Thank you.

@VieraPirker Hallo Viera,

wir möchten Sie informieren, dass unser Sales Center ist Montag bis Freitag von 08.30 bis 20.00 Uhr, Samstag und Sonntag von 09.00 bis 17.00 Uhr  telefonisch erreichbar: +49 (0)89 97580497

Steph
Social Media Team

urls.title: Booking | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Book your flight according to the dates and fares that best suit your needs and get ready to travel, for business or holiday, in the company of Air Dolomiti.

data.text:
Experience some of Puglia’s most iconic landscapes and best-loved white towns in the Itria Valley. Kick off by marvelling at conical-roofed #trulli houses in UNESCO-listed #Alberobello, before pushing on to Locorotondo 👉 https://t.co/gAr94kKBjn
📸 Daniel Clarke / @WeAreInPuglia https://t.co/iH121m2HCM

urls.title: HOW DO HELICOPTERS FLY? | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: To understand how helicopters fly, you have to forget everything you know about airplanes for a momen

data.text:
#AirDolomitiBlog
As you already know (almost) everything about airplanes, today’s article is dedicated to their rotary-winged cousins: #helicopters 👉 https://t.co/BN4bjMUUU5 https://t.co/LMI3cY2lEf
@jambu23 Thank you Jan, we just sent an internal reminder to our Baggage Center. Our colleagues are taking care of your file, and will give you a feedback soon. Thank you for your cooperation.

@marinaa051 Dear Marina, we deeply apologize. We just sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center, rest assured that all involved airports are still working on your file. Thank you for your patience.
@jambu23 Hi Jan, we are sorry to hear about this delayed bag. Please DM us with your file reference number, we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.
@Sam_FKC Dear Sam, we are taking care of your request via DM. Kindly keep this correspondence to get a better assistance, thank you.
@Catch_Chrissy We are really sorry to hear about your delayed bags. We are going to reply to your request in DM, thank you.
@Sam_FKC Dear Sam, we are really sorry to hear about your delayed bags. We have replied to your request via DM, thank you.
@Sam_FKC Dear Sam, we deeply apologize for what happened. We have replied to your request via DM. Thank you.

@ulkerciner Hi, the search for the second baggage is still ongoing, and all airports involved are working on your file. For up-to-date information, please stay in touch with our Baggage Center. Thank you.
@the_yung_teen Yes, definitely! ✈️

urls.title: Carry-on baggage
urls.description: The number of carry-on baggage items allowed depends on the travel class booked. The summary shows you whether you may bring one or two items of carry-on baggage, each weighing up to 8 kg, on board with you. In addition, another small item of baggage may be carried, as well as certain essential accessories for children or people with disabilities.

data.text:
@Coronavirus404 Hi, if you have a Lufthansa fare you can follow their cabin baggage rules: https://t.co/kh9Nr5MVSF
Thank you!

@LisaSch0104 For items left on board, it is the L&F at the arrivals airport that takes care of filing the found items. Please stay in touch with them, or fill out our form for further assistance: https://t.co/54prB2goa1
Thank you.
